Detailed Description

template<class RETURNTYPE>
class Mercury::BlockingReplyHandlerWithResult< RETURNTYPE >

This is a template class to make simple blocking two-way calls easier.

To use this class, first make a request using Bundle::startRequest. Then, instantiate an object of this type, using the expected reply type as the template argument. Then, call the waitForReply method, and the handler will block until a reply is received or the request times out.

Note:
You are STRONGLY discouraged from using this from within message handlers, as you are heading straight for all the common re-entrancy problems.
See also:
Bundle::startRequest
